column4: is there a way to get /lib/ld-linux.so.2 on the Amd64 version of Ubuntu?
I need it to execute a file
what exactly are you trying to achieve?
The Source Dedicated Server Update tool (For games from Steam/Valve) Wants a file that is at /lib/ld-linux.so.2. I have the AMD64 arcatecture so i don't have that file
